TopicTitle: Still Hoping to make it to KSP-TV

Articles.Content:
I've sent at least a couple PM's about this, but never heard back, so apparently a forum thread is the only way to get attention to this!

I'm still interested in becoming one of the sponsored broadcasters for KSP-TV, and would like to receive an application and more information for this.

Regards,

Northstar

Hi Northstar, I'll poke Rowsdower on monday
